data: For the first time in sixty years, Pablo Artelan, the majordomo of the Rancho Palomar, was troubled of soul at the approach of winter.
Kyne, Peter B. (Peter Bernard), 1880-1957; Ballinger, Harry Russell, 1892-1993 [Illustrator]; Cornwell, Dean, 1892-1960 [Illustrator]
